managementDescription: View and manage your retirement plan enrollments
noPlansFound: No plans found matching the selected filter.
choosePlanHeading: Take the first step toward retirement.
choosePlanSubtitle: You are making a great move just by starting. Here is the plan provided to help you build lasting wealth.
selectPlanSubtitle: Choose an option to see how it affects your future savings.
needHelpDeciding: Need help deciding? Our advisors are available to discuss which plan is right for your financial goals.
selectPlanToSeeDetails: Select a plan to see details.
planNotAvailableDefault: This plan is not available for your current profile.
bestForTaxFree: Best for tax-free growth over time.
solidOption: A solid option for your retirement savings.
excellentTaxFree: Excellent for growing your money tax-free.
betterPaycheck: Better for keeping more money in your paycheck today.
conNoTaxBreakToday: You don't get a tax break today
conPayTaxesWithdraw: You pay taxes when you take money out
planTraditional401kDesc: Contributions are made with pre-tax dollars, reducing your taxable income now. You'll pay taxes when you withdraw in retirement.
planRoth401kDesc: Contributions are after-tax. Withdrawals in retirement are tax-free.
planSafeHarborDesc: Employer contributions are immediately vested. No annual testing required.
designSavingsTitle: Make the most of your paycheck.
designSavingsSubtitle: Your contribution rate shapes your retirement outcome. Choose the level that aligns with your goals.
howMuchContribute: How much do you wish to contribute?
futureContributionsSubtitle: Small increases each year can create significant long-term impact.
enableAutoIncreaseDesc: Your contribution will increase slightly once per year. You can change this anytime.
stopIncreasingAtHelper: Auto-increase will stop once your contribution reaches this percentage.
doNotDropBelowHelper: Your contribution will not decrease below this percentage.
contributionsIncreaseToAndStop: Your contributions will gradually increase to {{percent}}% and stop there.
contributionNeverDropBelow: Your contribution will never drop below {{percent}}%.
validationStopAtMin: Must be at least your current contribution ({{percent}}%).
validationFloorMax: Must be at or below your current contribution.
validationFloorStopAt: Must be at or below stop increasing at.
withAnnualIncrease: With a {{percent}}% annual increase, you could accumulate
moreByAge: more by age {{age}}. That's an additional
assumesReturn: Assumes {{rate}}% annual return. Actual results may vary.
reviewSubtitle: Here's what your future could look like based on today's decisions.
strongPath: Based on your current selections, you're on a strong path. Small adjustments today can have outsized impact over {{years}} years of compounding growth.
autoIncreaseNotConfigured: Automatic annual increase is not configured.
acceptTerms: Please accept the terms to enable enrollment.
termsAndConditionsAgree: By proceeding, you agree to comply with the plan rules and applicable regulations. You understand that investments involve market risk and that you are responsible for your allocation and contribution decisions.
contributionsStartDesc: Deductions begin on the first payroll cycle following the 15th of next month.
processingTimeDesc: Takes 1–2 pay periods to reflect on your pay stub.
modifyAnytimeDesc: Change your contribution rate or investment elections at any time.
goToContributions: Go to Contributions to apply this change.
goToInvestments: Go to Investment Elections to apply this change.
portfolioStability: Your portfolio favors stability with measured growth potential.
portfolioGrowth: Your portfolio is positioned for higher growth with greater market exposure.
insightsFromPlanData: Insights generated from your plan data.
contributionsBeginNextPaycheck: Your contributions will begin with your next paycheck.
completeAllSections: Complete all sections and accept terms to activate.
insightIncreasePreTaxDesc: Adding 2% more to your pre-tax contribution could close approximately 40% of any projected shortfall.
insightTargetDate: Simplify with a Target Date Fund
insightTargetDateDesc: A single Target Retirement Fund automatically adjusts risk as you approach retirement age.
investmentElectionsSubtitle: Choose how your contributions are invested.
balanceGrowthStability: Balance growth and stability based on your risk comfort.
